input.name: __VIEWSTATE

img.alt: Germs are all around you. Stay healthy, wash your hands.

span.style: font-size: 14pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: This is the time of year when we see an increase in children who are coughing, sneezing and exhibiting other symptoms, typical during cold and flu season. With news of the spread of the “coronavirus”, we too see a heightened sense of concern about our own preparedness should we see cases closer to home.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Although we are being assured that Americans have a low risk of exposure to the virus, we are taking a number of precautions.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The McDonald Local School District is working in close coordination with the Trumbull County Board of Health and our other public schools to ensure the health, safety, and wellbeing of all of our students and staff.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We are also reviewing our safety plans and incorporating recommended steps that address widespread flu and pandemic disease outbreaks.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: In coordination with our County Health Commissioner and Epidemiologist, we are providing the most up-to-date information on our website. We too may send home information with students and use our one-call system.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The McDonald Local School District is committed to making all decisions in the best interest of the health, safety and wellbeing of students and of the community.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Noto Sans Symbols", sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Continuing to be in close contact with local health department and county emergency management agencies to remain up-to-date on local health emergency procedures in our community. This enables us to be proactive in our decision-making.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Noto Sans Symbols", sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Convening teams to help plan, educate and promote awareness of emergency procedures that are specific to a virus outbreak.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Noto Sans Symbols", sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Reviewing and modifying our emergency management plans as needed in light of any new information we receive.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Noto Sans Symbols", sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Reminding families to update their emergency contact information at their child’s school.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Noto Sans Symbols", sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Communicating/sharing through the TCESC website and social and news media any steps we are taking to be as prepared as possible.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: You can help yourself and your loved ones stay healthy by

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: , especially during these key times when you are likely to get and spread germs. The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommends:

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Noto Sans Symbols", sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre
